metadata.name: Generate Custom Project Instructions for Copilot
metadata.description: Automatically analyze codebase and create detailed copilot-instructions.md file to provide AI agent with deep project-specific context
metadata.context: Copilot Context Enhancement for Agent Mode
prerequisites: VS Code with GitHub Copilot installed
Copilot has access to read project files

outputs: Agent has enhanced project context for future tasks

steps.description: Open the Copilot chat panel in VS Code (click Copilot icon in sidebar or use keyboard shortcut)
steps.output: Copilot chat panel open and ready

steps.description: Click the settings/sparkle icon in the Copilot chat interface
Click 'Generate Instructions' option from the settings menu
steps.output: Copilot begins analyzing codebase, progress indicator shown

steps.description: Wait for Copilot to analyze the entire codebase (duration varies by project size: 1-5 minutes)
steps.output: Analysis complete, file generation in progress

steps.description: Review the newly created or updated .github/copilot-instructions.md file. Check that it contains: project overview, architecture details, tech stack, coding conventions, setup instructions
steps.success_criteria: File contains comprehensive project context with accurate information

steps.description: Edit the generated file to add project-specific details, preferences, or remove inaccurate information
steps.output: Instructions file customized to project needs

steps.description: Use Agent Mode with a coding task and observe improved context-aware responses referencing project architecture
steps.output: Agent demonstrates understanding of project structure and conventions
steps.success_criteria: Agent references project-specific details from instructions file

quality_checklist: File contains project name and overview
Agent uses context in subsequent interactions

when_to_generate: At project start (after initial structure is in place)
customization_tips: Add team-specific preferences not detected by analysis
Add examples of common patterns used in the project
best_practices.version_control: Commit copilot-instructions.md to Git so all team members benefit

related_entities.workflow: WF-DEV-007 (Generate Custom Project Instructions for Copilot)

time_savings.manual_documentation: 1-2 hours to manually document project context
time_savings.ongoing_benefit: Faster onboarding, better AI responses, consistent team understanding

version_history.changes: Initial template creation from Videos_015.md workflow extraction
